summary: Problems with the Department of Defense's real property records are one reason why it can't pass a financial statement audit. But keeping records on more than 600,000 buildings and structures isn't easy. To help, DOD put the military services in charge of tracking most of its real property assets in 2019. title: Defense Real Property: Developing Department-Wide Instructions and Adequate Internal Controls Should Help DOD Improve Recording of Transferred Assets
